Summary: triangle object flies directly over house
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jefferson
There were no other sightings in Jefferson on or around May 31st 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was outside having a cigarette, and i was gazing at the sky as always. i was facing the southeast direction, and noticed a triangle object flying silently over the house, coming from directly behind me. it was pretty low to the ground, and was black with 3 white lights (one in each point of triangle). it blocked out the stars as it flew over. i simply watched the object fly slowly & silently over my home and off into the distance. i must also say that over the past 3 years i have seen many strange lights and\or objects flying over the texas and arizona skies. as soon as i saw this object, i was amazed because i have heard of other people telling about triangle-shaped craft and have never encountered one. i wasnt nervous or anxious, just very curious & excited.
